app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps Tabee Language Exchange Chat
app_description: Set your target language and find a native speaker. Tabee supports 15 languages. Chat practice learn and meet new people around the globe. Learning new languages can be hard and dull. Especially languages that you find difficult. But learning new languages through fun conversations with real native speakers is fun and effective. Tabee lets you find language partners chat learn and make new friends around the globe. FIND LANGUAGE PARTNERS Share info about yourself set your target language and start searching for native speakers. See photos bio and location and explore our vast global community. Connect with cool people and who knows maybe you ll find your next best friend on Tabee. CHAT LEARN AND HAVE FUN Start a chat with anyone and learn new languages through exciting conversations. Practice the language that you want to learn daily and speed up the learning. Imagine being instantly corrected about grammar mistakes through laughter with a real native speaker. That will for sure make language learning effective and making the same mistakes over and over again. With Tabee you ll have fun while exploring the culture tradition and people of the language that you want to learn. SUPPORTS 15 LANGUAGES Learn and improve English Japanese Korean Spanish French Mandarin Chinese Cantonese Portuguese German Italian Russian Arabic Turkish Hindi Indonesian Thai and Vietnamese for FREE! MAKE FRIENDS Tabee is also a handy friend finder tool as it lets you meet new people through language learning. You can also use it to learn new languages cultures and traditions of the nation that is your next travel destination and find people to meet in real life when you are actually there. TABEE FEATURES: set target language 15 languages supported set native language meet native speakers and learners start a chat with anyone see chat history in the chat section browse our vast community of users set search filters men women age block users Tabee breaks the complexity and limits of traditional language learning. It makes learning more enjoyable natural and vivid. So join our growing community of language learners and meet new people the fun way! Download and use Tabee for free!
